name: First Run Movie Theater
text: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show! Our digital movie theater shows some of the most popular movies currently running in theaters.
movieinfo:
Secret Life of Pets

  • 7.8.16 - 7.29.16
  • Friday: 6pm & 9pm
  • Saturday: 3pm, 6pm & 9pm
  • Sunday: 3pm & 6pm
  • Monday-Thursday: 3pm & 6pm

Synopsis: Max (Louis C.K.) is a spoiled terrier who enjoys a comfortable life in a New York building until his owner adopts Duke, a giant and unruly canine. During their walk outside, they encounter a group of ferocious alley cats and wind up in a truck that's bound for the pound. Luckily, a rebellious rabbit named Snowball swoops in to save the doggy duo from captivity. In exchange, Snowball demands that Max and Duke join his gang of abandoned pets on a mission against the humans who've done them wrong.
